item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

January 1st and ringing in the New Year leaves me feeling excited and in wonder of all the possibilities for the year ahead!

What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2010?

Let's get together to discuss setting intentions for what we want to see happen for us this year.

Join us in discussion to expand your beliefs and live more consciously! We meet to share philosophies, ideas and connect with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson to create the change we desire.

We meet from 10:00am-11:30am in the back room. If the room is not available, look for our meetup sign on a table. Call me if you can't find us.

Panera is in a small plaza of shops after Kelly's, next to Marshalls and across the street from Target off the Lynn Fells Pkwy. It is on the South side of Route 1.

See you there!

Julie
Organizer
617-678-5061

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Manifesting What You Want In 2010
